original_title: Sri Lanka sells extra Rs56.93bn Treasury bills after auction
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka has sold 56,934 million rupees of treasury bills offered on tap at an average rates of 7.62, 7.91 and 8.03 percent, the state debt office said.
On Wednesday (23) the debt office raised 19.8 billion rupees of 3, 6 and 12 month bills.
